Articles.Content:
Outlaw Creations primary goal is the creating of ground, aerospace, and interplanetary transport system.

We will provide you with everything you need to transport your cargo safety to the destination of your choosing.

We will post all concepts with in this thread as we produce them.

NOTE: That some projects will remain top secret until their release.

We reserve the right to all products released unless otherwise stated.

The Outlaw Creations team would is always open to ideas and criticism about our concept parts,

Because we want to make the user happy with our products not just the design team.

Current Design Team Roster

sounthernrebel78 - Team Leader

-a few non KSP players-

Stephanie-modeler/texture

Elba-modeler/coder

Edited July 21, 2013 by sounthernrebel78
Updated list of non KSP players and minor other text updates

Turret Concept

predicted release date: postponed

*removed until plugin bugs can be worked out*

Truck concept

Flatbed concept

Tanker concept

This is a preview of our transport pack that will be released later this year. We are still working on plugins for our wheels as well as creating all the parts needed for the above craft. All above textures will change to show the Outlaw Creation colors and Logo. The Flatbed will have a magnetic docking system so allow easy loading and offloading of cargo. The Tanker will have a hose that will be operable in EVA only for fuel transfer. We will be adding storage tanks to fit and work with the tanker before we release the pack. We will use a custom docking system to attach the trailers to the Truck.

Edited May 24, 2013 by sounthernrebel78
Updated images and Discription.

Space Freighter - Gunslinger

You will be able to transport more cargo to the planet of your choosing with the Gunslinger. It will have to be built in space for the time being. Future versions will have VTOL abilities as well as landing gear so you will be able to off load cargo directly onto the ground. Yes, we will give you a way to off load the cargo and be able to secure it with out using docking ports. This will be achieved by using our magnetic system.

release date: Unknown at this time.

Edited May 24, 2013 by sounthernrebel78

EDIT: Nevermind, I'm stupid and didn't read the thread correctly.

Edited May 20, 2013 by Andrezado

I have updated some images as well as there description.

We will be adding a plane pack as well with the transport pack. Concepts of the planes will be that of 2 custom C-5 galaxies. One will be for that of planets with an oxygen based atmosphere. The second will be one that can fly in both but does not have the engine power to transport cargo in an oxygen based atmosphere. Both models will have some space flight capabilities to allow docking with our space freighter so they can be transported to the planet of your choosing. The C-5s will have the same magnetic system our flatbed will use. This will prevent cargo from moving while in flight.

For those worrying about part count, we will be making as few parts as possible. For example our truck will be made of three parts and our C-5s will be made up of 5 parts not counting the engines. This is subject to change as we begin testing the parts.

UPDATE

We have had to postpone all projects do to real world issues. We are always looking for more people to join the OC team. Currently need coders and plugin writers, but part makers are also welcome to apply. Just simply inbox me.
